title: Singapore hosts its first Global Health Film Festival, spotlighting pandemic and planetary health
desc: SINGAPORE, Jan. 29, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Singapore hosts its first Global Health Film Festival, spotlighting pandemic and planetary health

title: Donald Trump signals interest in easing tensions in Minneapolis
desc: President Donald Trump seemed to signal a willingness to ease tensions in Minneapolis after a second deadly shooting by federal immigration agents, but there was little evidence on Wednesday of any significant changes following weeks of harsh rhetoric and clashes with protesters.

title: China executes 11 members of gang who ran billion-dollar criminal empire in Myanmar
desc: China has executed 11 members of the notorious Ming family criminal gang, who ran mafia-like scam centers in Myanmar and killed workers who tried to escape, Chinese state media reported on Thursday.

title: China bans 73 people from all football for life, hits 13 teams with fines, loss of points
desc: Former Chinese Football Association president Chen Xuyuan, ex-national team coach Li Tie among those punished.

title: Desks today, doctors and engineers tomorrow
desc: KIGOMA: In many classrooms across the country, learning does not begin with textbooks or examinations, it simply begins with something far more basic: a place to sit. title: Xiaomi launches Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G and Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G in India
desc: Xiaomi on Thursday expanded its Redmi Note 15 series with the launch of Redmi Note 15 Pro+ 5G and Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G in India. Contrary to Note 15 108 MP camera, the new Redmi Note 15 Pro series features 200 MP camera system for up to 4× optical-level in-sensor zoom

title: Qatar and US take charge in Gaza as IDF urges halt to Hamas aid, return to war
desc: Restaurants and banks reopen and markets bustle as money flows; army urges immediate halt to 4,200 supply trucks entering weekly, fears growing US‑Qatari sway and warns status quo chiefly benefits Hamas, while acknowledging new civilian administration is PA‑linked

title: 'A tight decision' - Inside the call to make Sophie Molineux Australia captain
desc: The spin-bowling allrounder beat Tahlia McGrath and Ashleigh Gardner to the top job despite an injury-hit career

title: Birmingham dad 'blatantly shouts out ridiculous things' as he's finally jailed after a year on run
desc: Thomas Sweeney senior handed himself and is finally serving a jail sentence for a violent family scrap in the Gay Village in 2023
